title: Garlic roasted mushroom on toast
description: This is easy enough to make on a weekday, just pop the mushrooms in the oven while you get ready.

default: sea salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Place the mushroom on a baking tray and sprinkle the garlic over them. Drizzle with olive oil, season with salt and pepper and place in the oven for 20 minutes.
To serve, place the mushrooms on top of the toast and season to taste.
